item.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reveals new position in Alphabet
item.description: Berkshire disclosed a $4.3 billion stake in Alphabet at the end of the third quarter, making the Google parent the conglomerate's 10th largest equity ...

item.title: JPMorgan Chase wins fight with fintech firms over fees to access customer data
item.description: The JPMorgan Chase deals mark a shift in the power dynamic between banks, middlemen and the fintech apps that are increasingly threatening incumbents.

item.title: Bitcoin falls below $95,000 amid tech sell-off, bounces off lows on Friday
